instructions: Place chicken in shallow baking dish.
Mix all remaining ingredients and pour over chicken.
Marinate up to 30 mins, if you have time.
Preheat grill or broiler to med heat.
Cook chicken for 15 to 20 mins, turning over half way, or until no longer pink inside, an internal temperature of 165.
main_dish.title: Asian Baked Chicken

instructions: Cook asparagus over simmering water until bright green, about 5 to 8 mins.
side_dishes.title: Steamed Asparagus

instructions: Cook rice according to package.
Once rice is cooked transfer to a serving bowl.
Add olive oil to same saucepan used for rice heat on med.
Add garlic and cook for 30 secs.
Add rice back to pot and stir to coat with olive oil and garlic.
Transfer rice back to serving bowl and add chick peas, lemon zest & juice, parsley and salt & pepper, to taste.
Toss to combine and serve!
side_dishes.title: Chick Pea Lemon Rice

instructions: Preheat oven to 425.
In a small bowl mix thyme and lemon juice into mayonnaise.
Place salmon (skin side down) on a sheet of aluminum foil large enough to make a packet around fish.
Spread mayonnaise mixture on top.
Fold foil over fish and crimp edges to make a foil packet.
Bake 20-25 mins depending on thickness of fish, until it flakes easily with a fork.
To serve, carefully open the packet to release steam and check for doneness.
Use spatula to cut fish into portions, lifting fish away from its skin.
Also great on the grill!
main_dish.title: Salmon Thyme

instructions: Cut up watermelon into large (any size and shape works).
Place in serving bowl and add scallions.
Mix vinegar, lemon juice & oil in small bowl with fork or whisk.
Pour over watermelon and gently stir to coat.
Sprinkle with feta and season with sea salt & black pepper.
side_dishes.title: Watermelon & Feta Salad

instructions: Boil milk & water in large saucepan.
Whisk in cornmeal and salt & pepper to taste (up to 1/2 tsp salt).
Reduce heat to simmer.
Cook until thickened, 5-7 mins, whisking occasionally.
Once cooked, keep lid on tightly until ready to serve.
side_dishes.title: Creamy Polenta

instructions: Cut chicken into thin strips.
Heat oil in skillet over med heat.
Season chicken with salt & pepper & add to skillet.
Brown on both sides, about 4 minutes each.
Remove & set aside.
Add onion and red pepper flakes (optional) to pan & cook until soft, about 4 minutes.
Add garlic, cook 30 secs more.
Stir in tomatoes, coconut milk, lime juice, & salt.
Turn heat to low, cook for 5 mins more.
Return chicken to pan and continue cooking until no longer pink inside.
Top with scallions & cilantro.
main_dish.title: Coconut Chicken

instructions: In a large bowl prepare salad mix according to package directions.
Toss with dressing of choice.
side_dishes.title: Green Salad

instructions: Prepare quinoa according to package directions.
Salt & pepper to taste.
For variety, cook in broth instead of water, stir in a squeeze of lemon juice and/or 1 tbs olive oil, or toss in a handful of any chopped fresh herbs you have on hand.
side_dishes.title: Quinoa

instructions: Place tomatoes in bowl with vinegar, lemon juice, garlic & season with salt & pepper.
Let sit for 30 minutes.
Cook pasta per package directions.
Mix tomatoes with pasta & add spinach.
Sprinkle with parmesan cheese.
main_dish.title: Fresh Tomato Pasta with Baby Spinach

notes: Can Mix Tomatoes with Dressing In Advance

instructions: Drizzle coleslaw with favorite salad dressing.
side_dishes.title: Coleslaw

ingredients: 2 tbs honey mustard salad dressing, low fat
instructions: Place turkey in shallow baking dish & add honey mustard salad dressing.
Turn to coat & marinate up to 30 minutes.
Add oil to skillet & heat on medium.
Add turkey & brown quickly on each side, about 3 minutes each.
Remove & set aside.
Add carrots & broth to pan, turn heat to med & cover.
Cook 8 to 10 minutes until just tender.
Return turkey to pan & place on carrots, and top with asparagus.
Cover & cook for 5 to 8 minutes until turkey is cooked through.
Remove from heat & sprinkle with scallions & cheese.
main_dish.title: Honey Mustard Turkey Skillet

instructions: Steam zucchini for about 5 to 8 mins until tender.
side_dishes.title: Zucchini

instructions: Preheat oven to 375.
Chop potatoes & place in roasting pan.
Add oil, lemon juice, garlic, salt & pepper.
Stir to coat.
Bake until golden and fork tender, about 35 to 40 minutes.
side_dishes.title: Roasted Potatoes
